page.title: 03DOMESTIC LIFE & EDUCATION 2
page.content:
(Continued from Page 2) After{school}17 have a cooked meal between 5.00 & 6.00pm; 5 must wait until after 7.00pm before they eat with their parents. Only 2 have nothing to eat before bedtime.
The main leisure activity of 13 of the children is going out with friends; 10 belong to an{organisation}such as Scouts, Brownies, Majorettes or a Karate Club. Every day 10 watch at least 4 hours of TV and 10 play on a computer at least once per day; 15 must do a job about the house - usually looking after{pets.}Only 5 have no pets and 10 have more than one. All go on at least one week's {holiday}per year; 9 have had a foreign holiday (Spain is favourite) but only 4 have been to London.
